name: Fighting cop
description:
“Fighting cop " will take you into a world of intense and thrilling gunfights, challenging your shooting skills and survival abilities. Join this cruel battle, prove your bravery and wisdom, and protect this city.

In 'Fighting cop ', you can obtain:
1. Players have a refreshing shooting and hitting sensation from a first person perspective, immersive in the situation.
2. Shooting enemies with a revolver, only the boss who knocked down the last scene can enter the next level.
3. There are three story levels in the game, with modes of simple, average, and difficult to choose from
4. In each story, enemies can appear randomly, testing your shooting reaction ability
developers: 上海圣剑科技发展有限公司
publishers: 上海圣剑科技发展有限公司
